name: Rooting Tooting Wrestling: Shadow Boxing
description:
Rooting Tooting Wrestling presents Shadow Boxing!

The goal is to beat up the three bosses and to open your eyes to true horrors.

The controls are simple left and right click to punch and to interact with certain objects just use E.

This is slightly buggy but still pretty fun and short so enjoy!

Made for: https://itch.io/jam/the-haunted-ps1-summer-spooks
